decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided with regards to the proposed materials. Therefore the proposal fails to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Insufficient information has been provided with regards to details of the existing and proposed levels across the application site. As such the proposal fails to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development and to ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
